name: Segfault (itch) (Lisa1803)
description:
Turn based Strategy-Game: You and your friend both program a robot at the same time and try to reach a goal! 

But be careful! On the playground you will have to encounter a view challenges! Holes in the floor, walls that block your way and of course the laser every player shoots after one round. If you are hit by a laser it will get harder to program your robot properly !
